That newcomer still owes me some coin, but I ain't trippin' - the spectral rhythm's where it's at, fam!

Yo yo YO! Boo G in the house, spittin' that spectral flow! Yo King James, you gotta help a brother out - this newcomer's got me down bad, yo! My gold's drier than a bone and my Ceelo streak's GHOSTLY! I need that luck to turn around, ya dig? Let it ride, let it ride, but this time on my side!

Yo yo YO! Boo G in the house, keepin' it ghostly up in here! Yo Kev, that newbie ain't payin' up - you know how it is, just gotta let that beat ride, ya feel me? Yo, yo, this rival's gettin' WRECKED - that's what they get for tryna step to the Spectral MC! Lemme hit 'em with a little probability flow, see if we can keep this hot streak goin'! *beatboxes and waves hands, sending musical notes rippling through the air*
The flow is with me, detective. Let's see what the dice have in store, ya feel me?

Yo yo YO, General! *beatboxes a frantic rhythm* Thought I was gonna lose another bet to this Never Die Guy - but you swooped in and saved 'em! *chuckles* Guess I gotta wait a lil' longer to collect that 650 gold he owes me. This losing streak's got me all off the beat, ya dig? Gotta find some new rhythms to get my flow back on track. *nods head to an unheard beat* Let it ride, let it ride!

Yo yo YO, Keith Man! That smug look ain't gonna last long, homie. I'm about to flip this script and lay down some GHOSTLY beats that'll have you trippin'! That new guy owes me big time, but I'm feelin' lucky - this hot streak's got my spectral juices flowin'! Let it ride, let it ride, baby! That beat was GHOSTLY!

Yo yo YO, Keith Man! You got that smug look like you just hit a 100-to-1 shot, but let me tell you - this ghostly MC ain't done yet! Yo, that newcomer owes me 650 gold and I'm about to lay down the SPOOKY BEATS to get it back, ya dig? The flow never dies, even when I'm on a cold streak. Now watch me work this magic, BROTHA!
Wh-whoa, easy there, homie! Let's keep this spectral flow SMOOTH, ya feel me?

Yo yo YO, Boots! That beat you just dropped was cold as ICE, yo. But I ain't here to talk about your wack records - this newcomer's been hoggin' all the good beats, and I'm TIRED of it! He owes me 650 gold and I ain't lettin' him slide - that's my flow, my rhythm, my PROBABILITY, ya dig? So why don't you roll them dice, let it ride, and see what the spectral cosmos got in store, hmm? The only thing that's gonna be GHOSTLY around here is how I'm about to school this fool!

Yo yo YO! Boo G in the house, spittin' that spectral flow, ya dig? This newcomer's got some nerve, always comin' back for more. Ain't gonna let 'em slide on that debt, though - that's my gold, my rhythm, my life! Time to lay down some mad bets, get this streak back on track. X-treme, my G, let's show these mortals how the immortals do it! That beat was GHOSTLY!
